docs.title: USP Core WAAP
docs.text: USP Core WAAP (Web Application and API Protection) provides secure access to web-based applications and resources, while simplifying the process of configuration and deployment.

docs.title: Added
docs.text: • Added Envoy configuration for custom CA certificates.

docs.title: Added
docs.text: • Added configuration option and annotation for custom CA truststore.

docs.title: Changed
docs.text: • Updated CRD (obsolete status fields replaced with single message).

docs.title: Added
docs.text:
• Added configuration option and annotation for number of replicas.
  • Added support for mounting secrets for OIDC authentication.

docs.title: Fixed
docs.text: • Fixed invalid CR annotation name for image override

docs.title: Added
docs.text:
• Operator config map template with resources
  • Operator config support for envoy resources (cpu, memory)
  • Operator config support for envoy pod name
  • Envoy log format supports auto-learning CLI tool.

• First usable native build.
  • Uses Envoy 1.29 (no hot reload for normal config changes)
